Articles.Content:
Is there a thread that discusses basics of writing, compiling, and debugging plugins (i.e. dll files rather than part files)? The basic guide seems to focus on making new models/parts, but i cant seem to find anything that discusses what i need to make a plugin?

Do i need unity? Do i need KSP source code? etc...

Any help would be appreciated (even a link to the correct forum).

Where you should start: [http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Plugins](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Plugins) (although it should be noted that only covers 1 type of plugin: PartModules. The other type (KSPAddon) is pretty much the same though, just different initialisation methods)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-28T01:46:39Z" title="05/28/2015 01:46  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 28, 2015</time> by Crzyrndm**

> 
> Where you should start: [http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Plugins](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Plugins) (although it should be noted that only covers 1 type of plugin: PartModules. The other type (KSPAddon) is pretty much the same though, just different initialisation methods)

Thanks!
You obviously never heard of Google.

That...seems an odd way to bump a thread three weeks on...

arkie87, how goes the plugin-ing?
